channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: The Case of the Silent Dog
item.author: A Dixon Hawke Mystery
item.description: Dixon Hawke is called in when a child is kidnapped and held for ransom ... but this time, it's up to his assistant, Tommy Burkey, to nab the kidnappers before they become murderers!
